tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE jokes (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                      joke_text TEXT,
                      author_name TEXT,
                      date_created TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE joke_ideas (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                            idea_description TEXT,
                            creator_name TEXT,
                            date_created TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE joke_ratings (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                              joke_id INT,
                              rating INT,
                              rater_name TEXT);

CREATE TABLE joke_categories (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                                category_name TEXT);

CREATE TABLE joke_comments (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                              joke_id INT,
                              comment_text TEXT,
                              commenter_name TEXT,
                              date_posted TIMESTAMP);
